title: Looking to form team to make it to OCS
body:
Hey everyone,
I am a young gamer from Australia and recently turned 16, which means I am of age to compete in the OCS. I am looking for a bunch of teammates to join me and make a solid OCS roster. Once we have a full team assembled we will scrim against challenger teams and hopefully win :)

Requirements:
Silver V + 
Must have working mic
Available at least 3 days a week
Willing to take constructive criticism
No toxicity

I am also looking for analyst, coach and social media manager

Thanks everyone and have good day
Affiliation

Team name yet to be decided
No troll plz I am serious and this matter is not to be taken lightly

replies.body:

dw I am forever bronze scrub who will never make it out of bronze,
